Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for special effects.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the Product version package.

iconId.Wiki: The icon id to display in the interface whilst the effect is active.

conditionHp.Wiki: The maximum percentage of HP required for effect to activate.\n-1 = no requirement, 40 = less than 40% HP, 80 = less than 80% HP

effectEndurance.Wiki: The duration of effect. In seconds.

motionInterval.Wiki: The interval for the contents of this effect to be reapplied. 0 = once per frame. In seconds.

maxHpRate.Wiki: Multiplies maximum HP. See bCurrHPIndependeMaxHP to determine how current HP behaves.\n1 = default, .5 = -50%, 2 = +100%

slashDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies slash physical damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

blowDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies strike physical damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

thrustDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies thrust physical damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

neutralDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies Kinetic damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

magicDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies Energy damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

fireDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies Explosive damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

thunderDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies Coral damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

physicsAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies Kinetic damage dealt (post-defense, bypasses attack rating)

magicAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies Energy damage dealt (post-defense, bypasses attack rating)

fireAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies Explosive damage dealt (post-defense, bypasses attack rating)

thunderAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies Coral damage dealt (post-defense, bypasses attack rating)

physicsAttackPower.Wiki: Adds Kinetic damage to attack rating.

magicAttackPower.Wiki: Adds Energy damage to attack rating.

fireAttackPower.Wiki: Adds Explosive damage to attack rating.

thunderAttackPower.Wiki: Adds Coral damage to attack rating.

NoGuardDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplier to the damage suffered by the target if it is not guarding when hit.

vitalSpotChangeRate.Wiki: Multiplier to the damage suffered by the target if it is hit in a part designated as a 'weak point'.

normalSpotChangeRate.Wiki: Multiplier to the damage suffered by the target if it is hit normally.

maxHpChangeRate.Wiki: Multiplier to the maxHpRate values present on the character this effect belongs to.

behaviorId.Wiki: The ID of BehaviorParam or BehaviorParam_PC to apply to the effect's owner.\nRequires stateInfo 142 to function for non-player characters.\nRequires stateInfo 171 to function for player characters.

changeHpRate.Wiki: Causes HP loss to the character this effect belongs to by the set value. Negative values will restore. The value is a percentage of the maximum HP of the character.

changeHpPoint.Wiki: Causes HP loss to the character this effect belongs to by the set value. Negative values will restore. The value is a flat value.

changeMpRate.Wiki: Causes MP loss to the character this effect belongs to by the set value. Negative values will restore. The value is a percentage of the maximum MP of the character.

changeMpPoint.Wiki: Causes MP loss to the character this effect belongs to by the set value. Negative values will restore. The value is a flat value.

mpRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: The amount of MP recovered per second.

changeStaminaRate.Wiki: Causes Stamina loss to the character this effect belongs to by the set value. Negative values will restore. The value is a percentage of the maximum MP of the character.

changeStaminaPoint.Wiki: Causes Stamina loss to the character this effect belongs to by the set value. Negative values will restore. The value is a flat value.

staminaRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: The amount of stamina recovered per second.
The amount of stamina recovered per second.

magicEffectTimeChange.Wiki: For only spells whose effect duration is set to 0.1 seconds or more, add or subtract the time set to the effect duration.\n\nLingering Dragoncrest Ring uses stateinfo 193 which checks for isExtendSpEffectLife.

insideDurability.Wiki: Causes Durability loss to the used equipment of the character this effect belongs to by the set value. Negative values will restore. The value is a flat value.

maxDurability.Wiki: Affects hits required before durability is consumed. 5 = +5 hits before durability consumed, -5 = -5 hits before durability consumed

burnAttackPower.Wiki: Also known as ACS Anomaly. Adds to the amount of Burn status effect inflicted.

registStun.Wiki: Also known as Electric Discharge. Adds to the amount of Stun status effect inflicted.

registHighPlasma.Wiki: Adds to the amount of Plasma status effect inflicted.

registCurse.Wiki: Adds to the amount of Curse status effect inflicted.

fallDamageRate.Wiki: Does nothing. Fall control effects use stateInfo 47

soulRate.Wiki: Multiplies score received from enemies during missions.

allItemWeightChangeRate.Wiki: Multiplies maximum item weight. Does nothing. Probable DeS remnant.

animIdOffset.Wiki: Offsets animation IDs. Frequently used to make enemies swap movesets.

haveSoulRate.Wiki: Multiplies the amount of score granted after death. Requires base value in character's NpcParam row.

targetPriority.Wiki: Chance for an enemy to switch aggro targets to/away the effect's owner. Values range from -1 to 1. +1 = 100% chance to target owner instead of current target, -1 = 100% chance to target somebody else instead of current target (effect owner).

sightRangeMag_forEnemy.Wiki: The value to magnify the effect owner's target's visual range by.

sightRangeMag_forEnemyBattle.AltName: Visual Search Magnification % - For Enemy in Combat
sightRangeMag_forEnemyBattle.Wiki: The value to magnify the effect owner's target's visual range by, when in combat.

hearingSearchEnemyRate.Wiki: The value to magnify the effect owner's target's hearing range by.

setCurseResistPoint.Wiki: The effect owner's Curse resistance is set to this value.

soulStealRate.Wiki: The defense power against HP loss when soul steal move is used.

lifeReductionRate.Wiki: Multiplies the duration of the status effect with the stateInfo specified by lifeReductionType.

replaceSpEffectId.Wiki: The ID of spEffectParam to add once this effect ends.

cycleOccurrenceSpEffectId.Wiki: The ID of spEffectParam to add once every motionInterval.

atkOccurrenceSpEffectId.Wiki: ID of spEffectParam to add to victim when the owner hits an enemy.\nRequires stateInfo 152 or 153 (and likely other values used for weapon buffs) to work (VFX present)

guardDefFlickPowerRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to guard defense (for deflection).

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies shield stability. Requires stateInfo 158 (magic shield) or stateInfo 204 (great magic shield) to work (VFX present). Note that stability values over 100 nullify all stamina damage.

rayCastPassedTime.Wiki: Activation time for passing the line of sight (used for the Evil Eye). In milliseconds.

changeSuperArmorPoint.Wiki: Flat increase/decrease to poise. Requires stateInfo 155 to work.

bowDistRate.Wiki: Addition to the bowDistRate field of the held weapon for the effect's owner.

spCategory.Wiki: Determines special effect stacking behavior; how effects will react when another effect in the same category is added.

categoryPriority.Wiki: Used with specific spCategory values to determine stacking behavior. The higher the value, the lower the priority.

saveCategory.Wiki: Used to save effects so that they remain after quitting and loading the game. Only one effect per saveCategory is saved.

heroPointDamage.Wiki: Flat increase/decrease to humanity stat. -1 = add 1 humanity, 1 = remove 1 humanity

defFlickPower.Wiki: Modifies the repulsion defense for the effect owner's current weapon.

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: The absorption rate to use when calculating the repulsion damage for the effect owner's current weapon.

highPlasmaDamageRate.Wiki: Multiplier to the damage portion of the Plasma status effect when it is triggered on the effect's owner.

dmgLv_None.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_S.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_M.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_L.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_BlowM.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_Push.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_Strike.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_BlowS.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_Min.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_Uppercut.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_BlowLL.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

dmgLv_Breath.Wiki: The damage animation to use for this damage level if it is applied to the effect's owner.

atkAttribute.Wiki: Attack attribute to use when applying attack against the victim for attacks from this effect's owner.

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to use when applying attack against the victim for attacks from this effect's owner.

stateInfo.Wiki: ID of hardcoded system to use for unique effects. Causes effects itself and is necessary for certain fields to work.\nAlso used for visual effects by referring to the ID of a SpEffectVfxParam to use if useSpEffectEffect is true.

wepParamChange.Wiki: Determines how specific fields, such as damage modifiers, behave with certain attack categories

lifeReductionType.Wiki: Determines the type of status effect to modify the duration of. SpEffects with the specified stateInfo will be affected.

addBehaviorJudgeId_condition.Wiki: A condition value for the BehaviorJudgeId value used by the current owner.

addBehaviorJudgeId_add.Wiki: A value for the BehaviorJudgeId value used by the current owner.

effectTargetFriend.Wiki: Will affect the effect's owner's allies.

effectTargetEnemy.Wiki: Will affect the effect's owner's enemies.

effectTargetLive.Wiki: Will affect host player in multiplayer sessions.

effectTargetGhost.Wiki: Will affect all types of client players in multiplayer sessions.

effectTargetWhiteGhost.Wiki: Will affect friendly client players in multiplayer sessions.

effectTargetBlackGhost.Wiki: Will affect hostile client players in multiplayer sessions.

effectTargetAttacker.Wiki: When effect is added via equipParamWeapon spEffectBehavior field, this field determines if the effect will be applied to attacked enemies instead of the effect owner.\ntrue = affects victim, false = affects owner

dispIconNonactive.Wiki: If ON, the interface icon for the effect will still disabled even if the effect is inactive due to a failed conditional check.

useSpEffectEffect.Wiki: If ON, visual effects via SpEffectVfxParam will be used. See stateInfo for the ID of SpEffectVfxParam to be used.

bAdjustMagicAblity.Wiki: If ON, the intelligence stat will be used to correct various fields, such as damage.

bAdjustFaithAblity.Wiki: If ON, the faith stat will be used to correct various fields, such as damage.

bGameClearBonus.AltName: Apply Modifiers only after Game Clear
bGameClearBonus.Wiki: If ON, this effect will only be active in NG+ or higher.

magParamChange.Wiki: If ON, damage and scaling fields will apply to sorcery and pyromancies.

miracleParamChange.Wiki: If ON, damage and scaling fields will apply to miracles.

requestSOS.Wiki: Used only by White Sign Soapstone. Probably used for network matchmaking.

requestBlackSOS.Wiki: Used only by Red Sign Soapstone. Probably used for network matchmaking.

requestForceJoinBlackSOS.Wiki: Used only by (Cracked) Red Eye Orb. Probably used for network matchmaking.

requestKickSession.Wiki: Possibly kicks all clients out of your world.

requestLeaveSession.Wiki: Used only by Black Separation Crystal. Probably used to leave network sessions.

requestNpcInveda.Wiki: Used only by Black Eye Orb (Lautrec quest and cut Shiva quest).

noDead.Wiki: If ON, character cannot become a corpse (and thus die).

bCurrHPIndependeMaxHP.AltName: Ignore Current HP on Max HP Change
bCurrHPIndependeMaxHP.Wiki: Determines how current HP behaves when maximum HP is modified. true = current HP will not change, false = current HP will change with max HP

corrosionIgnore.Wiki: If ON, disables durability damage to the effect owner's weapons and armor.

sightSearchCutIgnore.Wiki: If ON, visual search adjustments from sightSearchEnemyCut are ignored by the effect owner.

hearingSearchCutIgnore.Wiki: If ON, auditory search adjustments from hearingSearchEnemyCut are ignored by the effect owner.

antiMagicIgnore.Wiki: If ON, magic blocking effects are ignored by the effect owner (Vow of Silence).

fakeTargetIgnore.Wiki: If ON, the effect owner will ignore fake targets (Aural Decoy projectiles).

fakeTargetIgnoreUndead.Wiki: If ON, the effect owner will ignore fake undead targets (Alluring Skull projectiles).

fakeTargetIgnoreAnimal.Wiki: If ON, the effect owner will ignore fake animal targets.

disableDepletedUraniumToxic.Wiki: If ON, effect owner becomes immune to Uranium.

disableBurn.Wiki: If ON, effect owner becomes immune to Burn.

disableStun.Wiki: If ON, effect owner becomes immune to Stun.

disableHighPlasma.Wiki: If ON, effect owner becomes immune to Plasma.

disableCurse.Wiki: If ON, effect owner becomes immune to curse.

stopCurse.Wiki: If ON, effect owner curse status will not increase or decrease.

enableLifeTime.Wiki: If ON, the effect duration can be extended by a TimeAct event..

hasTarget.Wiki: If ON, enable the activation conditions for the Evil Eye.

isFireDamageCancel.Wiki: If ON, this effect will be cancelled early if Explosive damage is applied to the effect owner.

isExtendSpEffectLife.AltName: Is Affected by Spell Duration Extension
isExtendSpEffectLife.Wiki: Determines if effectEndurance will be affected by stateInfo 193 which is used by the Lingering Dragoncrest Ring.

isDisableNetSync.Wiki: Do not synchronize with the net. It does not mean that you will be able to call it locally, but simply do not send it online. For example, a remote character does not activate locally, so nothing happens in that case.

bAdjustStrengthAblity.Wiki: Do you want to correct your strength?

bAdjustAgilityAblity.Wiki: Do you want to correct your workmanship?

chargeAttackParamChange.Wiki: If ON, this effect is applied to charged attacks.

throwAttackParamChange.Wiki: If ON, this effect is applied to throws.

vowType0.Wiki: Effect usable while in no covenant.

repAtkDmgLv.Wiki: The damage level of the attacking side changes to this value.

sightRangeMag_forMe.Wiki: The value to magnify the effect owner's visual range by.

sightRangeMag_forMeBattle.Wiki: The value to magnify the effect owner's visual range by, when in combat.

effectTargetOpposeTarget.Wiki: If ON, this effect will trigger if the current target is considered hostile.

effectTargetFriendlyTarget.Wiki: If ON, this effect will trigger if the current target is considered friendly.

effectTargetSelfTarget.Wiki: If ON, this effect will trigger if the current target is considered ourselves.

changeTeamType.Wiki: Replaces the effect owner's current team type with the specified type. Requires State Info 132 to apply.

dmypolyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to use for this effect.

vfxId.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

accumuOverFireId.AltName: Accumulator: SpEffect applied at Upper Limit
accumuOverFireId.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when the accumulator reaches the upper limit value.

accumuOverVal.Wiki: The upper limit value to use for this accumulator.

accumuUnderFireId.AltName: Accumulator: SpEffect applied at Lower Limit
accumuUnderFireId.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to apply when the accumulator reaches the lower limit value.

accumuUnderVal.Wiki: The lower limit value to use for this accumulator.

accumuVal.Wiki: The value to increment this accumulator by for each interval of this effect.

hearingSearchEnemyCut.Wiki: The value to reduce the distance at which enemies hear the effect's owner.\n0 = default, 50 = -50% hearing distance, 100 = -100% hearing distance

eye_angX.Wiki: Override the height angle used for the visual search cone. Requires State Info 267

eye_angY.Wiki: Override the width angle used for the visual search cone. Requires State Info 267

addDeceasedLv.Wiki: Add this value to the degree of death

vfxId1.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

vfxId2.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

vfxId3.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

vfxId4.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

vfxId5.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

vfxId6.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

vfxId7.Wiki: The VFX row to use when this effect is present.

registDepletedUraniumToxic.Wiki: Also known as Depleted Uranium. Adds to the amount of Uranium status effect inflicted.

AppearAiSoundId.Wiki: Invoke a AI sound instance when this effect is applied.

addFootEffectSfxId.AltName: Automatic Foot Effect: Particle ID Offset
addFootEffectSfxId.Wiki: The identifier of the foot SFX that is additionally generated during special effects. XYYZZZ ZZZ

repDefDmgLv.Wiki: The damage level of the defending side changes to this value.

toughnessDamageCutRate.Wiki: The absorption value to apply to toughness impacts.

weakDmgRateA.Wiki: The multiplier applied to damage that is against NPCs tagged as Type A.

weakDmgRateB.Wiki: The multiplier applied to damage that is against NPCs tagged as Type B.

weakDmgRateC.Wiki: The multiplier applied to damage that is against NPCs tagged as Type C.

weakDmgRateD.Wiki: The multiplier applied to damage that is against NPCs tagged as Type D.

weakDmgRateE.Wiki: The multiplier applied to damage that is against NPCs tagged as Type E.

weakDmgRateF.Wiki: The multiplier applied to damage that is against NPCs tagged as Type F.

darkDamageCutRate.Wiki: Multiplies Dark physical damage taken. Values below 1 mean damage is reduced, values above 1 mean damage is increased.

darkAttackRate.Wiki: Multiplies Dark damage dealt (post-defense, bypasses attack rating)

darkAttackPower.Wiki: Adds Dark damage to attack rating.

antiDarkSightRadius.Wiki: The radius (in metres) when within darkness where the effect owner can see fully.

antiDarkSightDmypolyId.AltName: Full Sight in Darkness: Dummy Polygon ID
antiDarkSightDmypolyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon from which the full sight in darkness radius is derived from.

conditionHpRate.Wiki: This effect only triggers if the effect owner's HP is above this specified value.

consumeStaminaRate.Wiki: Using the behavior parameters of the current weapon, multiply the stamina consumption values by this value.

itemDropRate.Wiki: The value to apply to the item discovery stat. Requires State Info 66 to apply.

hearingSearchRate.Wiki: Corrects the audibility of AI sound by magnification.

changeBurnResistPoint.Wiki: Adjust the Burn status resistance for the effect owner.

changeStunResistPoint.Wiki: Adjust the Stun status resistance for the effect owner.

changeHighPlasmaResistPoint.Wiki: Adjust the Plasma status resistance for the effect owner.

changeCurseResistPoint.Wiki: Adjust the Curse status resistance for the effect owner.

changeDepletedUraniumToxicResistPoint.Wiki: Adjust the Uranium status resistance for the effect owner.

slashAttackRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Slash damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker (post-defense, bypasses attack rating).

blowAttackRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Strike damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker (post-defense, bypasses attack rating).

thrustAttackRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Strike damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker (post-defense, bypasses attack rating).

neutralAttackRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Neutral damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker (post-defense, bypasses attack rating).

slashAttackPowerRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Slash damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

blowAttackPowerRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Strike damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

thrustAttackPowerRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Thrust damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

neutralAttackPowerRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Neutral damage applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

slashAttackPower.Wiki: The damage value (typed as Slash) applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

blowAttackPower.Wiki: The damage value (typed as Strike) applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

thrustAttackPower.Wiki: The damage value (typed as Thrust) applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

neutralAttackPower.Wiki: The damage value (typed as Neutral) applied to the effect owner from an attacker.

changeStrengthPoint.Wiki: The correction value to apply to the STR stat.

changeAgilityPoint.Wiki: The correction value to apply to the DEX stat.

changeMagicPoint.Wiki: The correction value to apply to the INT stat.

changeFaithPoint.Wiki: The correction value to apply to the FTH stat.

changeLuckPoint.Wiki: The correction value to apply to the LCK stat.

recoverArtsPoint_Str.Wiki: The amount of skill recovered based on the STR stat.

recoverArtsPoint_Dex.Wiki: The amount of skill recovered based on the DEX stat.

recoverArtsPoint_Magic.Wiki: The amount of skill recovered based on the INT stat.

recoverArtsPoint_Miracle.Wiki: The amount of skill recovered based on the FTH stat.

wetConditionType.Wiki: The type of wetness to apply when this effect is present.

isUseStatusAilmentAtkPowerCorrect.AltName: Use Status Correction from Current Weapon
isUseStatusAilmentAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: If ON, the status attack power multiplier correction of the attack parameter of the current weapon is applied.

isUseAtkParamAtkPowerCorrect.AltName: Apply Attack Power Correction from Current Weapon
isUseAtkParamAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: If ON, the attack power multiplier correction of the attack parameter of the current weapon is applied.

dontDeleteOnDead.Wiki: If ON, this effect will not be deleted even if the effect owner dies. Mainly used for death effects.

isWaitModeDelete.Wiki: If ON, this effect is deleted when in Wait mode. Wait mode is a state where the activation status change type or activation HP is met and the state is waiting to be activated. On the other hand, Sleep mode is a state where the priority is lowered due to the overwrite category, etc.

isForgotTarget.Wiki: If ON, the effect owner's target list will be cleared constantly.

isNoDeadEventBody.Wiki: If ON, this effect owner has a part with immortality applied.

isReceiveDamageStagger.Wiki: If ON, the damage the effect owner receives will become a stagger critical.

isRadarExclusion.Wiki: If ON, the effect owner will be hidden within the radar display.

isForceUpdate.Wiki: If ON, the effect owner will be forcefully updated.

saReceiveDamageRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Poise damage for the effect owner.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Kinetic damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Energy damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Explosive damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Coral damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Dark damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a player.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Kinetic damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered an NPC.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Energy damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered an NPC.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Explosive damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered an NPC.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Coral damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered an NPC.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Dark damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered an NPC.

defObjDmgCorrectRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Object damage for the effect owner.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Kinetic damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Energy damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Explosive damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Coral damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an player.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Dark damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an player.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Kinetic damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an NPC.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Energy damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an NPC.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Explosive damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an NPC.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Coral damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an NPC.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Dark damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an NPC.

invocationConditionsStateChange1.Wiki: If the specified state info is present, this effect is activated.

invocationConditionsStateChange2.Wiki: If the specified state info is present, this effect is activated.

invocationConditionsStateChange3.Wiki: If the specified state info is present, this effect is activated.

chrProxyHeightRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the character's proxy height collision capsule.

addAwarePointCorrectValue_forMe.Wiki: The search awareness correction to apply to the search angle for the effect owner.

addAwarePointCorrectValue_forTarget.Wiki: The search awareness correction to apply to the search angle for the effect owner's target.

normalLockRangeAddVal.Wiki: The distance to extend the normal lock-on distance by. In metres.

normalLockRangeAddPer.Wiki: The percentage distance to extend the normal lock-on distance by.

missileLockRangeAddVal.Wiki: The distance to extend the missile lock-on distance by. In metres.

missileLockRangeAddPer.Wiki: The percentage distance to extend the missile lock-on distance by.

missileMultiLockNumAdd.Wiki: The amount of multi-locks to add to the base amount of missile multi-locks.

missileMultiLockNumMul.Wiki: The percentage to multiply the base amount of missile multi-locks by.

magAwarePointCorrectValue_forMe.Wiki: The search mangification correction to apply for the effect owner.

magAwarePointCorrectValue_forTarget.Wiki: The search mangification correction to apply for the effect owner's target.

sightRangeMagSearch_forEnemy.AltName: Seen Target - Visual Search Distance %: Out of Combat
sightRangeMagSearch_forEnemy.Wiki: The visual search distance multiplier to apply for the effect owner's 'seen' target when not in combat.

sightRangeMagSearch_forEnemyBattle.AltName: Seen Target - Visual Search Distance %: In Combat
sightRangeMagSearch_forEnemyBattle.Wiki: The visual search distance multiplier to apply for the effect owner's 'seen' target when in combat.

sightRangeMagSearch_forMe.AltName: Visual Search Distance %: Out of Combat
sightRangeMagSearch_forMe.Wiki: The visual search distance multiplier to apply for the effect owner when not in combat.

sightRangeMagSearch_forMeBattle.Wiki: The visual search distance multiplier to apply for the effect owner when in combat.

changeSaPoint.Wiki: The amount of Poise damage to apply when this effect is present.

heightRateOfJudgmentCapsule.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the effect owner's collision capsule height when calculating line of sight.

noseDist_overWrite.Wiki: Override the NpcThinkParam parameter for the Sense value of the effect owner with this value.

staminaRecoverSpeedRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to Stamina recovery speed of the effect owner.

maxEnergyRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the energy capacity of the effect owner.

energyRecoverSpeedRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to energy recovery speed of the effect owner.

consumeEnergyRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the energy consumption of the effect owner.

changeEnRate.Wiki: The percentage amount of energy to change in the effect owner when this effect is present.

changeEnPoint.Wiki: The point amount of energy to change in the effect owner when this effect is present.

energyLastRecoverRate.Wiki: If (Unit energy recovery amount - overall energy consumption) is positive, multiply it by this value to get energy recovery amount.

eventPartsDamageRate.Wiki: The damage multiplier to apply for damage against the target part.

eventPartsReviveRate.Wiki: The HP revival rate for the target part.

eventPartsRecoverRate.Wiki: The HP recovery rate for the target part.

changePaRate.Wiki: The damage percentage to apply to the effect owner's Pulse Armor when this effect is activated.

changePaPoint.Wiki: The damage to apply to the effect owner's Pulse Armor when this effect is activated.

energyDrawRate_GroundBoost.Wiki: The energy consumption multiplier to apply for a ground boost when this effect is present.

energyDrawRate_FlyBoost.Wiki: The energy consumption multiplier to apply for an aerial boost when this effect is present.

energyDrawRate_UpBoost.Wiki: The energy consumption multiplier to apply for a vertical boost when this effect is present.

stealthPowerCorrectValue.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to stealth performance.

overwriteGroupId.Wiki: The override category this effect belongs to.

defPlayerImpactCorrectRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Impact damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a player.

defEnemyImpactCorrectRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Impact damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a NPC.

atkPlayerImpactCorrectRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Impact damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an player.

atkEnemyImpactCorrectRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Impact damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an NPC.

normalLockRangeOverwriteDist.Wiki: Overrides the normal lock-on distance (setting it to this specified value).

residualImpactSubSpeedRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to the accumulative impact against the effect owner.

atkPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Pa.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Pulse Armor damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an player.

atkEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Pa.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Pulse Armor damage for the effect owner, if the defender is considered an NPC.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Pa.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Pulse Armor damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a player.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Pa.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming Pulse Armor damage for the effect owner, if the attacker is considered a NPC.

atkImpactCorrectRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to outgoing Pulse Armor damage for the effect owner.
